name: Sonic battle with scratch cats
description:
-v1.0.0

Press space to jump and left and right arrows to move, you can roll and spindash! (down while running) (down + space)

-v1.1.0

-press up to look up

-fixed sprite cycle

-new version of game

-v1.2.0

-super peelout added! (up + space)

-v1.2.1

-better player sprites (mainly crouching)

-v1.2.2

-put in a sonic level select code (not telling) for an extra life

-v1.3.0

-even better sprites

-slightly better collision when rolling into wall

-animation for health when enemy dies

-v1.3.1

-no double gravity glitch

-v1.3.2

-no more lives if you die (it was buggy)

-v1.3.3

-Enemy looks like in life sprite

-v1.4.0

-newer hitbox to improve when rolling

-no more damage if you beat enemy

-Enemy's health will show if you play again after his defeat

-Enemy will fly away WAY smoother

-v1.4.1

-going max speed adds a dash effect

-v1.4.2

-effect now applies when jumping + changed effect

-v1.4.3

-crouch 4 times for Easter egg

-faster spinning

-v1.5.0

-no cheat when spindashing

-error for Easter egg input more than once

-v1.6.0 (Part 1)

-new peelout sound

-new peelout effect

-no peelout glitch (kept peelout after hit)

-quicker run cycle in peelout

-v1.7.0 (Part 2)

-walk cycle speed depends on your speed

-added extra speed after peelout

-v1.7.1

-press a to toggle walking/running sounds

-v1.8.0

-dropdash added

-major bug fix

-v1.9.0

-Timer sprites added

-timer stops after enemy is defeated

-v1.9.1

-no direction change if rolling
